messages.content: How do I install the ComfyUI-LaVi-Bridge-Wrapper node?
The node can be installed using either the Manager or by cloning the repo and running the pip command: `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
Where are the models downloaded during installation?

The following models are downloaded during installation: 
- `huggingface.co/Kijai/t5-large-encoder-only-bf16 vicissface.co/shihaozhao/LaVi-Bridge/`.
Why isn't the llama2 version of the node working?
The llama2 version of the node is not currently available or there may be an issue with its functionality. The developers are working on resolving this.
